nodes.label: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Two children standing a moderate distance apart, holding cups connected by a straight line representing a string.
Motion lines around one child's mouth indicate speaking.
The student understands the basic concept of a string telephone allowing communication over distance.
Represents sound transmission through the use of motion lines but lacks understanding of sound wave propagation.
Include a description of how sound travels along the string or show waves to represent sound transmission.
